scanQrCode: Scan me to open the Portfolio on another device!
presentationParagraph:
Making games and sites is at the core of what drives me.
I'm on a quest for well-done work, progress, and novelty.
stepMiddleschoolText:
For me, programming started this early, on Scratch.

I was just having fun self-learning algorithms, mainly by creating fangames.
stepHighschoolText:
The desire to create professional video games led me to switch to GameMaker.

I was also introduced to web development during my optional computer science classes.
stepSabbaticalTimeText: 1 year and a half of fully focusing (to the point of never going out…at all) building prototypes with the intent of getting good at making games.
stepBackToEducationText:
Living off video game development won't happen anytime soon, it seems.

So, I've chosen to focus on web development in the meantime, by completing a diploma course on OpenClassrooms.
stepInternshipText:
On the advice of my mentors and as a transition before entering the workforce, I am currently doing an internship to specialize in ReactJS.

I am still actively improving my game-making skills, having notably created a framework that speeds up and simplifies the development process.
